owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.ipfsImageHash: IPFS hash of the profile image

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.newIpfsImageHash: New IPFS hash for the profile image

getBoomerUserByName(string).notice: Get user address by boomer name

getDirectMessages(address,uint256,uint25.notice: Get direct messages between two users

isBoomerNameAvailable(string).notice: Check if a boomer name is available

isRegisteredBoomerUser(address).notice: Check if a user is registered

registerBoomerUser(string,string).notice: Register a new .boomer user with profile image

sendDirectMessage(address,string).notice: Send a direct message to another user

sendGroupMessage(string).notice: Send a message to the group chat
